content: simple stockinette gloves with half fingers to fit a man s small hand or a woman s large full fingers can easily be substituted thumb is placed slightly toward the palm and pinkie finger is lower than the other three fingers sizing options can be done by changing needle size and gauge this pattern is nice worked in a pretty variegated yarn since it s done in simple stockinette i designed this because i needed to make some fgs for my daughter s singing partner and couldn t find a pattern that would work in the yarn i wanted maybe this will help you out too **please note this pattern has not been tested ** pm me if you find any mistakes
